title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-1.8 - Application of terms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-1.8 - Application of terms

State Regulations

Whenever in this Part reference is made to a county
medical society, it shall, in the case of a licensed physician of any other
school of medical practice, be construed to mean the board representing such
other school of medical practice. In the case of a physician who is licensed as
an osteopath, the "board" may be either the appropriate county medical society
or the New York State Osteopathic Society, Inc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
326-1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
